title: About
text: Hello! I’m Skylar Witte, a student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln studying Sports Media & Communications and Broadcasting. I am currently enrolled in a course called Sports Data Analysis and Visualization, and in this course I have learned how to not only analyze sports data, but also develop investigative sports stories. This blog will show how I have turned what I have learned into real life sports storytelling using data.

title: Is the rider or the bull more important to the score in bull riding?
text:
Nebraska is on track for a title run.
